feed.title: Adam Dinan
feed.subtitle: Postdoctoral researcher in bioinformatics and computational biology.

entry.title: Welcome to my personal blog
entry.content: Welcome to my personal blog. I will use this space to discuss bioinformatics, data visualisation, machine learning, genomics, genetics and related topics.
